articles.description: Manchester City's Champions League campaign opened in frustrating fashion as they were held to a draw by impressive Inter Milan at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Manchester City 0-0 Inter Milan: Hosts frustrated in Champions League opener

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary from Celtic vs Slovan Bratislava in the Champions League.
articles.title: Celtic vs Slovan Bratislava LIVE: Champions League score, line-ups, commentary & stats

articles.description: Tottenham score two late goals to come from behind and knock out Championship side Coventry City in the EFL Cup third round.
articles.title: Carabao Cup: Late turnaround helps Spurs sink Coventry

articles.description: First there was Jadon Sancho, then there was Jude Bellingham. Is Jamie Gittens about to become Borussia Dortmund's next English star?
articles.title: Jamie Gittens: Who is Borussia Dortmund and England winger?

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says LIV defectors Ian Poulter and Lee Westwood are too far removed from the European players to be considered as future Ryder Cup captains.
articles.title: Ryder Cup: Rory McIlroy says Ian Poulter and Lee Westwood are 'too far removed' to be captain candidates

articles.description: Ben Stokes will have a scan on his hamstring injury next week as England wait on the captain’s fitness for the first Test in Pakistan.
articles.title: Ben Stokes: England captain to have scan before Pakistan tour

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from PSG vs Girona in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Paris St-Germain 1-0 Girona: Goalkeeper Paulo Gazzaniga gifts French side victory

articles.description: Fossil fuel companies invest more than £4bn in sports sponsorship to "greenwash their reputations", according to a new report.
articles.title: Fossil fuel companies invest £4bn in sports to 'greenwash' reputations - report

articles.description: Kamindu Mendis continues his remarkable start to Test cricket by scoring his fourth century on day one of the first Test against New Zealand.
articles.title: Kamindu Mendis: Sri Lanka batter scores fourth Test century against New Zealand

articles.description: Vivianne Miedema scored on her Manchester City debut to help her side to a commanding lead over Paris FC in the first leg of their Champions League second round qualifier.
articles.title: Paris FC 0-5 Manchester City: Vivianne Miedema scores on her debut in rout
